title: Northern Garden
marks: Signature and Date LR: [Patrick R. Dinon, 7-10-56]
description: Abstraction with muted yellows and greens; white brushstrokes throughout; bright red and orange converge in a central focal point.
creditline: Special Purchase Award Fund given by Kirk Douglas
